title: Gary Vee EXPOSES NFT's
itunes:author: Andrew Schulz's Flagrant with Akaash Singh
itunes:summary:
0:00 - start
0:10 - why NFTs are NOT bulls**t
6:00 - NFTs in macro vs micro
15:00 - what's the biggest con in first world history
22:00 - Gary Vee impersonators
32:00 - how to find a good NFT
47:00 - What is the Metaverse
1:01:00 - Gary will down the NY Jets
1:21:00 - how to raise the next generation without being soft

Flagrant 2 is a comedy podcast that delivers unfiltered, unapologetic, and unruly hot takes directly to your dome piece. In an era dictated by political correctness, hosts Andrew Schulz and Akaash Singh, along with AlexxMedia and Mark Gagnon, could care less about sensitivities. If it’s funny and flagrant it flies. If you are sensitive this podcast is not for you. But if you miss the days of comedians actually being funny instead of preaching to the CHOIR then welcome to The Flagrancy.

Join the Patreon Asshole Army:
http://bit.ly/2xQwHYf
